file_content.text: The Extractors are dead! And you saved us... I can't believe it.
I'm looking for Doctor Meln and Doctor Ortis. They were working on a very important weapon.
I think I remember them. Scientists or something, right? They haven't been seen since they were taken below.
I've never felt better. I could run circles around this prison--or, you know, kilometers away from it.
Tell me what you know about the Gorinth Brig.
I know Lieutenant Vekarr rarely leaves his interrogation rooms, on the lower level. He keeps the most valuable prisoners close by.
Here. Take the Extractor's ID card. If you're looking to free someone else, you'll have to get onto the lower level to do it.
Get to the Republic outpost and find Wes Durga. He'll help you.
You bust me out of an Imperial prison and you're thanking me? Maybe I'm dreaming.
Maybe I'll find someone more useful down there.
Whatever you're looking for, I hope you find it fast. I've watched dozens get on that elevator and never come back up.
I'm getting out of here before more Extractors show up. Good luck to you.
You don't look like an Extractor... still, please don't hurt me.
